affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 事情, 真实的, 事物

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常包含着以前的经验证明对方是能依赖的意思。
侧重指因自身能力不足或缺乏自信心而依靠他人或物给予帮助或支持。
侧重忠诚可靠与可信赖。
指在相信的基础上可进一步依靠，着重可靠性。
指绝对相信或信赖某人。
普通用词，常表示一种缓和、不太肯定的口气。

word_group.brief_definition: 依靠, 依赖, 依托

bilingual.target: 我们不能总是依靠运气。

bilingual.source: We should learn to rely on ourselves.
bilingual.target: 我们应该学会依靠自己。

bilingual.source: We can rely on the help of friends.
bilingual.target: 我们可以依靠朋友的帮助。

bilingual.source: Animals rely on instinct to find food.
bilingual.target: 动物依靠本能寻找食物。

bilingual.source: Fishermen rely on the tide to catch fish.
Fishermen rely on the hai for their livelihood.
Fishermen rely on fishing for their livelihood.
Farmers rely on the aquifer for irrigation.
bilingual.target: 农民依靠含水层进行灌溉。

bilingual.source: The inhabitants rely on fishing for their livelihood.

yingyinNormal.en: Around the country, kids rely on a half-million-member army of transportation experts, the nation's school bus drivers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个国家的孩子都依靠这50万公交专家，这些学校的巴士司机。

yingyinNormal.en: Raymond's not a politician. He relies on our political expertise as much as we rely on his business acumen.
yingyinNormal.zh: Raymond不是政客。他依赖我们的政治意见，正如我们依靠他的商业头脑。

yingyinNormal.en: I had to support myself. I couldn't rely on Mr. Robertson's promise to see me through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我必须自寻出路，不能光指望罗伯森的承诺帮我度过难关。

yingyinNormal.en: Our school buses work amazingly well, which is good considering how much we rely on them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的校车非常好，这也考虑到了我们对它们的依赖程度。

yingyinNormal.en: So I'm delusional and hormonal. And I can't trust my delusional thoughts. I have to rely on the labs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我现在爱幻想，又冲动，但是我 又不能任凭主观臆断，我得依赖检验结果。

yingyinNormal.en: To keep the power on, we rely on what's been called the largest and most complex machine in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要保持供电，我们依赖一种大而复杂的机器。

yingyinNormal.en: To keep it from crashing down again, we rely on a hidden army whose soldiers put their lives on the line every single day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为防止电网再次瘫痪，我们启用了神秘部队，他们每天都与电线为伴。

yingyinNormal.en: So, we rely therefore on your complete discretion. Good. Anyway, gentlemen, madam, allow me to be the first to wish you, bon voyage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你们最好深思熟虑，很好！至少各位让我先祝福你们一路顺风。

yingyinNormal.en: There was no time for calculating. I had to rely on my experience of managing the altitude and speed of thousands of flights over four decades.
yingyinNormal.zh: 根本没有时间去计算，我不得不依赖自己这四十多年来，从上千次飞行中积累下来的对高度和速度的掌控经验。

yingyinNormal.en: But you can't just rely on a lucky monkey. There are some pretty serious rules you have to follow if you don't want to completely mess up the year ahead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要想好运来，仅靠幸运猴子可不够，有些正经规矩必须得好好遵守，否则，新的一年就会被你搞得乱七八糟。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But in general it <highlight>relies</highlight> on a name-and-shame method of compliance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但总体上，该宪章主要依赖“揭露和蒙羞”的顺从方法。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Relying</highlight> on ethical persuasion rather than law to address the misuse of body ideals may be the best step.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 依靠道德劝说而非法律来处理理想体形的滥用问题，可能是最佳办法。

examination_example.sentence: To find their sites, archaeologists today <highlight>rely</highlight> heavily on systematic survey methods and a variety of high-technology tools and techniques.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了找到遗址，考古学家如今主要依赖系统的勘测方法和各种高科技工具和技术。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 一般指根据以往的经验而指望某人不会辜负希望或期待某事不落空。
专指由于自身能力不足或缺乏自信心而依赖别人给予帮助或支持，同时主观认为这种依赖不会遭到拒绝。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: In part, we <highlight>rely</highlight> on looks, humans wide faces are associated with dominance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，我们依靠长相，认为有大宽脸的人都处于主导地位。

examination_example.sentence: When people imagine their own choices as belonging to someone else, they <highlight>rely</highlight> less on decision shortcuts to make those choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们想象到自己为他人做选择时，他们就不会那么依赖决策捷径来做出这些选择。

examination_example.sentence: According to data released in January 2017, 56 percent of bills are paid online, which means that just under half of payments still <highlight>rely</highlight> on delivery services to be completed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据2017年1月发布的数据显示，56%的账单是在网上支付的，这意味着仍有近一半的账单是通过快递完成的。

examination_example.sentence: They allow the animal to <highlight>rely</highlight> on sunshine for its nutrition.

examination_example.sentence: The food-as-medicine movement has been around for decades, but it's making progress as physicians and medical institutions make food a formal part of treatment, rather than <highlight>relying</highlight> solely on medications (药物) .

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 相信；信赖；依赖；依靠；依仗

examination_example.sentence: After the Revolutionary War(1775-1783), Webster believed that Americans should have their own dictionary, rather than <highlight>rely</highlight> on British dictionaries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 革命战争（1775-1783）后，韦伯斯特认为美国人应该有自己的字典，而不是依赖英国的字典。

examination_example.sentence: What does the underlined phrase “<highlight>rely</highlight> on” in Paragraph 3 mean?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第3段中划线的短语 "依靠 "是什么意思？

examination_example.sentence: Yet not many of us will realize how much we <highlight>rely</highlight> on it until we compare our lives to those in the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我们中没有多少人会意识到我们有多么依赖它，直到我们把自己的生活与过去的生活作比较。
